setting.name: Language
setting.label: Display Language
setting.description: Set the language for the phones display

setting.name: Country_Tone_Type
setting.label: Country Tone Type
setting.description: Set the language for the phones display

setting.name: Admin_Password
setting.label: Administrator Password
setting.description: The central administration password for this device

setting.name: Use_DNS_SRV
setting.label: Use DNS SRV
setting.description: Whether or not to use SRV Record in DNS Query (Checked: Use, in time of failure, try A Record again. Unchecked: Attempt only with A Record.)

setting.name: Watchdog_Timeout
setting.label: Watchdog Timeout
setting.description: Watchdog for reboot by timeout (0: Disable reboot. else: Set time.)

setting.name: Use_CPU_PowerSave
setting.label: CPU power save
setting.description: Enable to use CPU power save

setting.name: Register_Expire
setting.label: Register Expiry
setting.description: The validity time of the registration at the SIP server after which reregistration should occur

setting.name: Register_Retry_Backoff_Interval
setting.label: Register Retry Backoff Interval
setting.description: Set this timer for periodically retry when phone is not registered

setting.name: Request_Timeout
setting.label: Request Timeout
setting.description: Timeout in ms

setting.name: Use_Fixed_Primary_Server
setting.label: Use Fixed Primary Server
setting.description: Check to fix the primary server

setting.name: Use_DNS_Additional_Records
setting.label: Use DNS Additional Records
setting.description: Check to use additional DNS records for redundancy

setting.name: Mode
setting.label: Syslog Mode
setting.description: Set to enable SYSLOG

setting.name: Server_IP
setting.label: Syslog Server Address
setting.description: Syslog server IP address

setting.name: Server_Port
setting.label: Syslog Server Port
setting.description: Syslog server port number

setting.name: Use_MACIP_Header
setting.label: Use MAC and IP Header
setting.description: MAC and IP information attached to syslog message

setting.name: Use_Option_2
setting.label: Use DNS Option 2
setting.description: DNS Option 2: Time offset

setting.name: Use_Option_42
setting.label: Use DNS Option 42
setting.description: DNS Option 42: NTP handout

setting.name: Use_Option_66
setting.label: Use DNS Option 66
setting.description: DNS Option 66: TFTP server name

setting.name: Busy_Tone_Count
setting.label: Busy Tone Count
setting.description: The number of busy tones after a call is ended

setting.name: Transfer_Busy_Tone_Count
setting.label: Transfer Busy Tone Count
setting.description: The number of busy tones after a call transfer failed

setting.name: Call_Waiting_Tone_Count
setting.label: Call Waiting Tone Count
setting.description: The number of tones for a waiting call (-1:Infinite 0:Disable 1-10:Number

setting.name: Reject_Hold_Request_On_Hold
setting.label: Forbid on hold while on hold or on transfer
setting.description: Check to reject putting the call on hold while on hold or on transfer

setting.name: Reject_Hold_Request_On_2Calls
setting.label: Forbid on hold while having 2 calls
setting.description: Check to forbid putting the call on hold while having 2 calls

setting.name: Block_Request_Hold_On_Holded
setting.label: Forbid on hold while having another call on hold
setting.description: Check to block putting the call on hold while there is another call on hold

setting.name: Session_Expire
setting.label: Session Expire
setting.description: Set the session expire time. (Unit: seconds)

setting.name: Dial_Sending_Timeout
setting.label: Dial Sending Timeout
setting.description: Invite expire time in ms

setting.name: Check_Alias_In_Call_List
setting.label: Check alias in call list
setting.description: Check if a certain alias is in the call list whose line is busy, if so don't make a new call

setting.name: Remove_DASH_On_Alias
setting.label: Remove DASH On Alias
setting.description: Delete "-" from phone numbers

setting.name: Use_Silent_Packet_On_Mute
setting.label: Use silent packet on Mute
setting.description: Whether or not to send a silent RTP packet when in Mute

setting.name: Call_Disconnect_TimeOut
setting.label: Call Disconnect Timeout
setting.description: Timeout when the network is disconnected during Call busy or Ringing

setting.name: Use_Invite_Filtering
setting.label: Invite Filtering
setting.description: Use filtering for incoming Invite

setting.name: Anonymous_Displayname
setting.label: Anonymous Displayname
setting.description: Name to be shown when the received call has no caller ID

setting.name: Use_Update_Caller_ID
setting.label: Update Caller ID when in call
setting.description: Enable to update Caller ID when it changes in the middle of a call

setting.name: Hide_Displayname
setting.label: Hide Displayname
setting.description: Check to hide the Caller ID

setting.name: Update_Caller_ID_After_Transfer
setting.label: Update Caller ID After Transfer
setting.description: When selected Disable/Enable Caller ID Update this will also affect logs.

setting.name: Use_Local_Hold_Tone
setting.label: Local Hold Tone
setting.description: Whether or not to play Hold tone at the terminal at it's own style

setting.name: RTP_Hold_Play_Wait_Time
setting.label: RTP Hold Play Wait Time
setting.description: Wait time for playing hold melody

setting.name: Enable_Hold_With_Inactive
setting.label: Hold With Inactive
setting.description: When hold mode is mixed or RFC3264 send a=inactive

setting.name: Enable_RTP_Hold
setting.label: RTP Hold
setting.description: No RTP send and set hold tone when receiving "sendonly"

setting.name: Use_Transfer_Target_Hold
setting.label: Transfer Target Hold
setting.description: Send hold request to transfer target before transferor sends REFER

setting.name: Use_Blind_Transfer
setting.label: Blind Transfer
setting.description: Whether or not to use blind transfer (Unattended Transfer)

setting.name: Use_Contact_For_Refer_To
setting.label: Contact For Refer To
setting.description: Whether to make Refer-To header refering to Contact Header or to SIP URL of transfer target

setting.name: Use_Attended_Transfer_On_Call_Switch
setting.label: Use Attended Transfer On Call Switch
setting.description: In case of 2 calls, if 1st call is busy, do not connect to attended transfer

setting.name: Check_BYE_After_Refer
setting.label: Check BYE After Refer
setting.description: In case of receiving BYE before recieving NOTIFY after transferer sends refer, mark transfer failed

setting.name: Enable_Enterprise_Blind_Transfer
setting.label: Enterprise Blind Transfer
setting.description: Set to minimalize the UI for transfer

setting.name: Use_Forward
setting.label: Use Forward
setting.description: Set to minimalize the UI for transfer

setting.name: Mode
setting.label: Mode
setting.description: Whether or not to play Hold tone at the terminal at it's own style

setting.name: Phone_Number
setting.label: Phone Number
setting.description: Set the Phone Number to forward to

setting.name: No_Answer_Timeout
setting.label: No Answer Timeout
setting.description: The timeout for forwarding a call when No Answer in seconds

setting.name: Disable_Call_Waiting_On_Busy
setting.label: Disable Call Waiting On Busy
setting.description: When mode is Forward Busy, a connected call is also Forward OK

setting.name: Use_Subscribe
setting.label: Use Subscribe for Message Waiting Indication

setting.name: Subscribe_Server
setting.label: Subscribe Server
setting.description: Server address to send MWI subscribe in case Use_Subscribe is checked, Empty: Use SIP Server

setting.name: Subscribe_Expire
setting.label: Subscribe Expire
setting.description: MWI Subscribe expire value in seconds

setting.name: VMS_Alias
setting.label: VMS Alias
setting.description: Message Waiting Indication extension number

setting.name: Duration
setting.label: Duration
setting.description: Duration of SIP INFO

setting.name: RFC2833_Volume
setting.label: RFC2833 Volume
setting.description: Volume of RFC2833 package

setting.name: RFC2833_Payload_Type
setting.label: RFC2833 Payload Type
setting.description: Payload type of RFC2833 package

setting.name: RFC2833_Packet_Count
setting.label: RFC2833 Packet Count
setting.description: DTMF packet count

setting.name: RFC2833_End_Count
setting.label: RFC2833 End Packet Count
setting.description: DTMF end packet count

setting.name: Enable_Auto_DTMF_Mode
setting.label: Enable Auto DTMF Mode
setting.description: Decision method of DTMF transmission system

setting.name: Sendkey_Block_Timeout
setting.label: Sendkey Block Timeout
setting.description: The timeout for Send Key after answering incoming call

setting.name: Phone_Number_1
setting.label: Phone Number 1
setting.description: Set to Call Block number

setting.name: Phone_Number_2
setting.label: Phone Number 2
setting.description: Set to Call Block number

setting.name: Phone_Number_3
setting.label: Phone Number 3
setting.description: Set to Call Block number

setting.name: SIP_Response_Code
setting.label: SIP Response Code
setting.description: Set to SIP Response Code Block

setting.name: Message_Server
setting.label: Message Server
setting.description: Message Server Address

setting.name: Register_Expire
setting.label: IM Registration Expire
setting.description: Expire time of IM

setting.name: SMS_Prefix
setting.label: IM Prefix
setting.description: Set to IM Prefix

setting.name: Receive_Display
setting.label: Display IM Received
setting.description: Enable indication for IM in the display when IM is received

setting.name: Inform_Interval
setting.label: Inform Interval
setting.description: IM indication interval

setting.name: Auto_Save
setting.label: Auto Save IM
setting.description: Enable automatic saving of IM

setting.name: My_Word0
setting.label: My Word 0
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: My_Word1
setting.label: My Word 1
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: My_Word2
setting.label: My Word 2
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: My_Word3
setting.label: My Word 3
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: My_Word4
setting.label: My Word 4
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: My_Word5
setting.label: My Word 5
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: My_Word6
setting.label: My Word 6
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: My_Word7
setting.label: My Word 7
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: My_Word8
setting.label: My Word 8
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: My_Word9
setting.label: My Word 9
setting.description: Set to text on the display

setting.name: Enable_NTP
setting.label: Enable NTP
setting.description: Enable the use of NTP

setting.name: Date_Format
setting.label: Date Format
setting.description: Date display format

setting.name: Time_Format
setting.label: 24h Time Format
setting.description: Enable to set time to 24h, Disable to set time to 12h

setting.name: NTP_Refresh_Interval
setting.label: NTP refresh Interval
setting.description: Time in seconds between NTP re-syncs

setting.name: NTP_Server1
setting.label: Primary NTP Server
setting.description: Address of the primary NTP server

setting.name: NTP_Server2
setting.label: Secondary NTP Server
setting.description: Address of the secondary NTP server

setting.name: Local_Port
setting.label: Local Port
setting.description: Local port number used by SIP

setting.name: Timer_B
setting.label: SIP Timer B
setting.description: SIP INVITE Transaction timeout

setting.name: Timer_F
setting.label: SIP Timer F
setting.description: SIP non-INVITE Transaction timeout

setting.name: Use_User_Agent
setting.label: Add User Agent-Header to SIP Message

setting.name: Max_Forwards
setting.label: Maximum Forwards
setting.description: Maximum forwards header value of SIP message

setting.name: Retry_Hold_On_491
setting.label: Retry Hold On 491
setting.description: Set to retry in case of recieving 491 for response of hold request

setting.name: Use_rport
setting.label: Use rport
setting.description: Enable the use of rport

setting.name: Enable_STUN_OPTIONS
setting.label: STUN Options
setting.description: Enable the use of Stun Options

setting.name: Options_Expire
setting.label: Options Expire
setting.description: RFC3581: in case received and rport in via Header of response different from local ip, send options periodically

setting.name: Request_REFER_Timeout
setting.label: Request REFER Timeout
setting.description: Units in ms

setting.name: Wait_REFER_Response_Timeout
setting.label: Wait REFER Response Timeout
setting.description: Units in ms

setting.name: 180_Retransmission_Interval
setting.label: 180 Retransmission Interval
setting.description: Units in seconds, 0 for disable

setting.name: Invite_Expire
setting.label: Invite Expire
setting.description: The INVITE expire time. Units in seconds, 0 for disable

setting.name: Reuse_Auth_Header_Within_Dialog
setting.label: Reuse Authentication Header Within Dialog
setting.description: Reuse authentication header within the same dialog

setting.name: Reuse_Auth_Header_On_Register
setting.label: Reuse Authentication Header on register
setting.description: Reuse authentication header on REGISTER

setting.name: Retry_To_Redirect_Contact
setting.label: Retry to redirect contact
setting.description: Try to redirect if phone received 3xx messages

setting.name: Auth_Retry_Count
setting.label: Authentication retry count
setting.description: The number of retries after a server response 401/407

setting.name: Ignore_183_Without_SDP
setting.label: Ignore 183 without SDP
setting.description: Disregard 183 comes without SDP package

setting.name: Illegal_UserName_Check_At_Request_URI
setting.label: Illegal UserName Check At Request URI
setting.description: When username and IP bring different information request-URI in time of an incomming call an 404 error occurs

setting.name: Remove_Register_On_Start
setting.label: Remove Register on Start
setting.description: First send Unregister when starting after rebooting

setting.name: Check_Escape_Of_Call_Number
setting.label: Check Escape Of Call Number
setting.description: Check escape character in call number

setting.name: Use_Increase_session_id
setting.label: Increase Session ID
setting.description: Whether or not to increase owners session id in case the content of SDP changes

setting.name: Use_Increase_version
setting.label: Increase Version
setting.description: Whether or not to increase owners version in case the content of SDP changes

setting.name: Session_Name
setting.label: Session Name
setting.description: SDP Session name

setting.name: Use_RTCP
setting.label: Use RTCP
setting.description: Enable the use of RTCP

setting.name: RTP_Port_Min
setting.label: RTP Port Min
setting.description: Minimum port number that can be used by RTP

setting.name: RTP_Port_Max
setting.label: RTP Port Max
setting.description: Maximum Port number that can be used by RTP

setting.name: RTCP_Report_Interval
setting.label: RTCP Report Interval
setting.description: Interval for sending RTCP (Unit:ms)

setting.name: RTCP_CNAME
setting.label: RTCP CNAME
setting.description: Character string entered into CNAME for RTCP Messages

setting.name: Last_RTP_Received_Timeout
setting.label: Last RTP Received Timeout
setting.description: 0: Disable the RTP monitor. If the RTP packets are not sent for the set number of seconds, BYE is send.

setting.name: Data_Packet_TxRate
setting.label: Data Packet Tx Rate
setting.description: The accepted transfer rates, default all b/g modes

setting.name: Default_Listen_Interval
setting.label: Default Listen Interval
setting.description: 802.11 listen interval

setting.name: Use_PowerSave_Wakeup_On_Register
setting.label: Use PowerSave Wakeup On Register
setting.description: Wakeup from powersave before registering

setting.name: Use_802_11_Rogue_Ap_Management
setting.label: Use 802.11 Rogue AP Management
setting.description: In case of receiving authentication fail for AP load balancing, whether or not to manage rogue AP

setting.name: Use_Adaptive_Data_Rate
setting.label: Use Adaptive Data Rate
setting.description: Adaptive data Rate on Driver

setting.name: Use_Enterprise_Auth_Mode
setting.label: Use Enterprise Authentication Mode
setting.description: Set to use enterprise mode in 802.1x

setting.name: Enable_Check_Server_Cert
setting.label: Check Server Certificate
setting.description: Enable to use the certificate of the server, Disable to use the certificate of phone

setting.name: Force_Enable_Short_Preamble
setting.label: Force Enable Short Preamble
setting.description: Enable to force Short Preamble

setting.name: Scan_Channel_List
setting.label: Scan Channel List
setting.description: Set the channels to be scanned, seperated by comma

setting.name: Try_Beacon_Signal_Level
setting.label: Try Beacon Signal Level
setting.description: Preroaming Access Point signal detection level in dBm

setting.name: Try_Rx_Signal_Level
setting.label: Try Rx Signal Level
setting.description: The minimal signal level before roaming in dBm

setting.name: Try_Over_TxError_Count
setting.label: Try Over TxError Count
setting.description: When the Tx error count is over this threshold attempt roaming

setting.name: Scan_Period
setting.label: Scan Period
setting.description: Roaming attempt interval

setting.name: Roaming_Disable_On_Calling
setting.label: Disable Roaming during call
setting.description: Set to disable roaming when the line is in use

setting.name: Level_Diff_Higher_Than_Curr_Site
setting.label: Level Difference Higher Than Current Site
setting.description: When roaming to a Site with higher Rx Level (RSSI) than current Site, the reference has to be higher

setting.name: Clear_Blacklist_Interval
setting.label: Clear Blacklist Interval
setting.description: Clear the Black List of Access Points failing in connection after the interval time

setting.name: Backoff_Interval
setting.label: Backoff Interval
setting.description: Dynamic network Backoff Interval

setting.name: L3_Detect
setting.label: L3 Detect
setting.description: Enable L3 roaming detection (When enabled DHCP Verify is disabled automatically

setting.name: DHCP_Verify_Count
setting.label: DHCP Verify Count after L3 roaming
setting.description: Number of DHCP binding checks after L3 Roaming

setting.name: DHCP_Verify_Interval
setting.label: DHCP Verify Interval after L3 roaming
setting.description: Interval time in seconds of DHCP binding checks after L3 Roaming

setting.name: 8021X_Bind_Timeout
setting.label: 802.1x Bind Timeout
setting.description: 802.1x Bind Timeout in seconds

setting.name: Precedence_0
setting.label: Priority ToS Precedence 0
setting.description: Set the priority of ToS Precedence 0

setting.name: Precedence_1
setting.label: Priority ToS Precedence 1
setting.description: Set the priority of ToS Precedence 1

setting.name: Precedence_2
setting.label: Priority ToS Precedence 2
setting.description: Set the priority of ToS Precedence 2

setting.name: Precedence_3
setting.label: Priority ToS Precedence 3
setting.description: Set the priority of ToS Precedence 3

setting.name: Precedence_4
setting.label: Priority ToS Precedence 4
setting.description: Set the priority of ToS Precedence 4

setting.name: Precedence_5
setting.label: Priority ToS Precedence 5
setting.description: Set the priority of ToS Precedence 5

setting.name: Precedence_6
setting.label: Priority ToS Precedence 6
setting.description: Set the priority of ToS Precedence 6

setting.name: Precedence_7
setting.label: Priority ToS Precedence 7
setting.description: Set the priority of ToS Precedence 7

setting.name: SSID
setting.description: WiFi SSID string for this network, if left empty, search for a network. Note: SSIDs are case sensitive

setting.name: SIP_Outbound_Proxy
setting.label: SIP Outbound Proxy
setting.description: URL of the SIP Outbound Proxy to use for this network

setting.name: Join_Method
setting.label: Join Method
setting.description: Checked: Automatic. Unchecked: Manual

setting.name: Enable_DHCP
setting.label: DHCP
setting.description: Use DHCP to configure IP address, netmask, dns and gateway

setting.name: Address
setting.label: IP Address (no DHCP)
setting.description: Static IP Address of the phone (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: Netmask
setting.label: Netmask (no DHCP)
setting.description: Netmask (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: Gateway
setting.label: Default Gateway (no DHCP)
setting.description: Default gateway (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: DNS1
setting.label: DNS Server 1 (no DHCP)
setting.description: Primary DNS Server for this network (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: DNS2
setting.label: DNS Server 2 (no DHCP)
setting.description: Secondary DNS Server for this network (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: Security
setting.label: Security
setting.description: Set the kind of security used on the WiFi network

setting.name: WEP_Bits
setting.label: WEP Keylength
setting.description: Keylength for the WEP encryption key

setting.name: WEP_Key1
setting.label: WEP Key 1
setting.description: Enter the WEP Key. Example: 128bit 00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00

setting.name: WPA_PSK_PassPhrase
setting.label: WPA-PSK PassPhrase
setting.description: Set the PassPhrase used for WPA-PSK encryption

setting.name: WPA_PSK_Key
setting.label: WPA PSK Key
setting.description: Enter the WPA PSK Key

setting.name: Proactive_Key_Caching
setting.label: Proactive Key Caching
setting.description: Enable proactive key caching which is also known as opportunistic PMKSA caching for WPA2

setting.name: Authentication_Algorithm
setting.label: Authentication Algorithm
setting.description: Which type of 802.1x Authentication to use

setting.name: 8021X_Name
setting.label: 802.1x Name
setting.description: Name used for 802.1x Authentication

setting.name: 8021X_Password
setting.label: 802.1x Password
setting.description: Password for 802.1x Authentication

setting.name: DiffServ_Signal
setting.label: Diffserv Signal
setting.description: SIP Message DSCP

setting.name: DiffServ_Media
setting.label: Diffserv Media
setting.description: RTP DSCP

setting.name: WMM
setting.label: WMM
setting.description: Use Wireless MultiMedia prioritization

setting.name: Payload_Type
setting.label: Payload Type
setting.description: Set the payload (Codec) priorities

setting.name: Multiframe
setting.description: Set the Multiframe size for each Coder using the priorities set in Payload priorities

setting.name: Payload_Type
setting.label: Payload Type
setting.description: Set the payload (Codec) priorities

setting.name: Multiframe
setting.description: Set the Multiframe size for each Coder using the priorities set in Payload priorities

setting.name: SSID
setting.description: WiFi SSID string for this network, if left empty, search for a network. Note: SSIDs are case sensitive

setting.name: SIP_Outbound_Proxy
setting.label: SIP Outbound Proxy
setting.description: URL of the SIP Outbound Proxy to use for this network

setting.name: Join_Method
setting.label: Join Method
setting.description: Checked: Automatic. Unchecked: Manual

setting.name: Enable_DHCP
setting.label: DHCP
setting.description: Use DHCP to configure IP address, netmask, dns and gateway

setting.name: Address
setting.label: IP Address (no DHCP)
setting.description: Static IP Address of the phone (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: Netmask
setting.label: Netmask (no DHCP)
setting.description: Netmask (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: Gateway
setting.label: Default Gateway (no DHCP)
setting.description: Default gateway (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: DNS1
setting.label: DNS Server 1 (no DHCP)
setting.description: Primary DNS Server for this network (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: DNS2
setting.label: DNS Server 2 (no DHCP)
setting.description: Secondary DNS Server for this network (if not obtained via DHCP)

setting.name: Security
setting.label: Security
setting.description: Set the kind of security used on the WiFi network

setting.name: WEP_Bits
setting.label: WEP Keylength
setting.description: Keylength for the WEP encryption key

setting.name: WEP_Key1
setting.label: WEP Key 1
setting.description: Enter the WEP Key. Example: 128bit 00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00

setting.name: WPA_PSK_PassPhrase
setting.label: WPA-PSK PassPhrase
setting.description: Set the PassPhrase used for WPA-PSK encryption

setting.name: WPA_PSK_Key
setting.label: WPA PSK Key
setting.description: Enter the WPA PSK Key

setting.name: Proactive_Key_Caching
setting.label: Proactive Key Caching
setting.description: Enable proactive key caching which is also known as opportunistic PMKSA caching for WPA2

setting.name: Authentication_Algorithm
setting.label: Authentication Algorithm
setting.description: Which type of Post Authentication to use

setting.name: 8021X_Name
setting.label: 802.1x Name
setting.description: Name used for 802.1x Authentication

setting.name: 8021X_Password
setting.label: 802.1x Password
setting.description: Password for 802.1x Authentication

setting.name: DiffServ_Signal
setting.label: Diffserv Signal
setting.description: SIP Message DSCP

setting.name: DiffServ_Media
setting.label: Diffserv Media
setting.description: RTP DSCP

setting.name: WMM
setting.label: WMM
setting.description: Use Wireless MultiMedia prioritization

setting.name: Payload_Type
setting.label: Payload Type
setting.description: Set the payload (Codec) priorities

setting.name: Multiframe
setting.description: Set the Multiframe size for each Coder using the priorities set in Payload priorities

setting.name: Use_Provision
setting.label: Use Provision
setting.description: Enable Provisioning system

setting.name: Firmware_URL
setting.label: Firmware URL
setting.description: URL under which to find the firmware files

setting.name: Phonebook_Name
setting.label: Phonebook Name
setting.description: Name under which to find the Phonebook file
